profile: Full-stack developer specialized in WordPress and single-page applications. I have developed a wide range of websites using the latest trends and frameworks. Skilled at writing efficient, scalable, and maintainable code using current best practices.

exprerience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
tasks: Design the architecture, develop and maintenance the corporate website of the company.
Lead on the design and implementation of new features and functionality to enhance the user experience.
Creation of a design system based on Storybook to manage all frontend resources of the corporate website.
Creation of single-page applications and other microsites based on Vue.js.
Monitor website performance and take appropriate action to ensure optimal performance.
Define development workflows and processes to optimize the resources.
Passionate about keeping up-to-date with the latest trends in web developments, CSS technics, JS frameworks, and accessibility.

exprerience.title: Web Developer
tasks: Created custom plugins, themes, and functions for WordPress based sites.
Tested front-end code in multiple browsers to ensure cross-browser compatability.
Maintained brand standards under company guidelines.
Optimized pages for page speed using Google Page Speed (API) for Apache to obtain higher rankings on Search Engines (SEM).
Front-end development using latest HTML5 and CSS3 techniques, backed by jQuery and Vue.js to enable optimum user experience throughout the websites.
